Pricing

We love having visitors!

Feel free to come by and take a look at the space whenever you have a chance. For recurring access to the space and tools, the center offers monthly, quarterly, and annual packages:

1 Month - $50

4 Months - $150

8 Months - $200

1 Year - $300
